experience.title: Founder
experience.description: Observing analytics and developing strategies for audience engagement.Collaboration Negotiations alongside performance tracking of Influencers.Content calendar planning and multimedia production for advertising campaigns using hashtag strategies and engagement tactics.Curating the best experiences in Bangalore’s nightlife coming up with new concepts to engage with the target clientele.Online and offline networking efforts and relationship building with the clients like Richboyz Entertainment, BIRA, VRO hospitality, DADDY, Budweiser India, Corona, Johnny Walker and Sunfeast.Built and managed a dedicated team from scratch of event professionals, fostering a collaborative and high-performing environment. Influencer Marketing Campaigns for Budweiser India in events like: Road to Ultra, The Boiler Room, DGTL and Hardline.
